General.Name: Polisan Holding AS
General.Description: Polisan Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of chemical materials in Turkey. The company offers formaldehyde, formaldehyde resins, construction chemicals, and AUS 32; paints; and bulk liquid storage, general warehouse, and loading and unloading services for dry bulk and general cargo vessels. It also provides polyethylene terephthalate resin and preform products for use in beverage, water, drink, and food, as well as in synthetic fibers. In addition, the company engages in the construction of water channels, roads, bridges, dams, sewers, and infrastructure facilities; manufacturing, marketing, and trading in construction and installation materials; and organizing domestic and overseas trips for tourism, occupation, and education purposes. Polisan Holding A.S. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Dilovasi, Turkey.
General.Address: Dilovasi Organize Sanayi Bölgesi, Dilovasi, Turkey
